Diana Prince.Action: Strides confidently towards the Louvre, working as an antiquities expert, interacting with armed military/security without hesitation.
Reflects thoughtfully on humanity and the darker aspects of the world, demonstrating insight and awareness.
Contemplates a photo of her and her fallen friends, showing reverence and connection to the past.
Warily eyes the Wayne Enterprises logo, indicating cautiousness or distrust.
Reflects deeply on her history and experiences, showing sincerity and depth of feeling.
Eyes the Wayne Enterprises logo warily and opens the crate with caution and focus.
Contemplates the ancient photograph and her friends with a thoughtful, reflective demeanor, showing awareness of history and personal narrative.
Overwhelmed by memory and history, but maintains composure and insight.
Merely observes training of other Amazons as a young girl, showing admiration but no direct skill demonstrated here.
Looks back at Antiope with a smile after being caught, showing readiness to learn and engage.

Watches Amazon warriors practice various combat skills with admiration and focus.
Rehearses Artemis' moves with a fierce scowl, practicing stabbing imaginary enemies.
Makes eye contact with General Antiope and confidently requests to join the fighting.
Runs away quickly to avoid Mnemosyne, attempting an escape through the marketplace crowd.

Greets her mother politely and innocently, showing respect and warmth.
Looks hopeful towards Antiope about her readiness for training, indicating trust and positive regard.
Diana spots a potential escape route and attempts a difficult long jump despite the risk, showing willingness to take on challenges and act decisively.
Fails to make the jump and ends up dangling, needing to be rescued by Queen Hippolyta.
Despite failure, she maintains a mischievous smile and a positive attitude, indicating confidence even when a plan doesn't succeed.
Shows eagerness and initiative by questioning her mother on when she will start her training, indicating awareness of her growth needs and readiness to take on responsibility.
Exhibits unease when being pulled up, showing some vulnerability and lack of full control in the situation.

Accepts Hippolyta's final decision to forbid training without further protest, displaying restraint at a young age.
Shows boredom and impatience by saying 'You've told me that story' when Hippolyta begins relating a tale.

Sneaks out of the palace past guards and runs off into the night, showing initiative and boldness.

Trains intensely with Antiope, displaying growing skill and strength but still not at peak warrior level.

Takes responsibility when her sister is accused, showing accountability and emotional courage.

Takes the blame for disobeying and betraying by her own sister at age 12.
Locks eyes with Antiope as she is led away, showing resolve or awareness.

Runs away feeling frightened, guilty, rejected.
Quickly notices and identifies a German warplane out of control and trailing smoke.

Appears as a confident, epic figure above the surface, preparing to rescue the pilot.
Effectively rescues the drowning pilot by ripping him from the sinking cockpit and swimming to the surface.

Lassos a girder and swings it at Sir Patrick, but he skillfully avoids it and the debris causes an unintended explosion.
Leaps towards Sir Patrick while avoiding massive chunks of earth, blasts back under a hovering chunk to reposition herself, then slams into Sir Patrick sending him flying.
Engages in close combat with a powerful adversary despite the chaotic environment and dangerous obstacles.
Grabs a large wooden crate and throws it to Sir Patrick to help the team.
Throws a large bomb into the air towards the grenades to cause an explosion, protecting the team.
Dodges Ares's massive sword attack that slices a tank in two, showing agility and quick reflexes.
Leaps up at Ares and tackles him onto a hangar roof despite being thrown with a hook and chain, demonstrating bravery and offensive initiative.
Stops herself by digging her hand into the roof of the hangar after tackling Ares, showing strength and control.
Turns to see and focuses on the team on the ground, showing concern for their safety despite her own peril.
Overwhelmed by an otherworldly connection to Steve, showing emotional sensitivity and care.
Explodes with grief and anger after Steve's death, freeing herself to fight back against enemies.
Transformed by grief and rage into a violent machine, attacking and decimating soldiers without mercy.
Resists Ares' taunts and anger, refusing to give in despite extreme provocation.
Looks at Maru, who is cowering and vulnerable, but struggles not to harm her despite anger.
Her eyes turn black with anger and she struggles internally with violent impulses.
Spins through the crowd and performs a super spin attack that blows soldiers back; skillfully dodges and kicks Ares, uses her lasso effectively to flip him over and slam him.
Resists emotional manipulation and anger baiting from Ares despite heavy breathing and anger.
Lifts a tank despite being blasted back, showing great strength and determination.
Shows hesitation and internal struggle as her eyes flicker with darkness and she battles with wanting to end Maru, revealing vulnerability and emotional challenge.
Pauses and breathes heavily when almost overcome by Ares, suggesting she is momentarily vulnerable though she recovers.
Hesitates to crush the terrified woman despite anger and provocation.
Rejects Ares' negative view of humanity and defends people.
Protects others by standing calmly in the face of danger and deflecting an attack to shield them.
Affirms belief in love and protection even when confronted by her aggressive adversary, showing tolerance and sincerity.
Emphasizes protection regardless of whether others 'deserve' it, demonstrating trustworthiness and good-natured intent.
Remains unmoved and calm while massive debris smashes into the tank and combusts around her, showing resilience and confidence.
Hurls the remains of the tank aside and calmly walks towards Ares, showing physical strength and composed demeanor.
Deflects a furious barrage of debris and weapons from Ares, then absorbs the power and sends him back, indicating skill and tactical intelligence.
Catches a massive lightning bolt in her gauntlets and withstands a storm of lightning attacks, demonstrating high-level capability and control.
Approaches the final powerful attack from Ares while still holding her position and using her abilities, showing bravery but also putting herself at considerable risk.
Diana leans into the dawn battlefield, witnessing the soldiers waking up and the better side of man returning.
Diana walks with Etta into the public celebration, sharing in the communal joy.
Diana modestly corrects Etta by giving credit to Steve rather than taking praise herself.
Leaps into the air over Ares' blast, crosses bracelets midair, and sends lightning back into Ares, defeating him decisively.
Lands softly after the explosion, showing control and grace post-conflict.
Looks around battlefield and observes situation calmly after battle, showing situational awareness.
Responds modestly by crediting Steve for saving everyone instead of taking sole credit.
Corrects Etta by giving credit to Steve for saving everyone.
Responds 'I don't think so' to invitation to join the mission, showing gentle refusal.
Forces a smile despite sadness, showing emotional restraint but sincere compassion.
Reflects on the pain behind beauty and wisdom, demonstrating deep empathy.
Contemplates loss and suffering while reaffirming commitment to love and fight for peace.
Places Steve's watch beside his photograph, showing a tender remembrance.
Types a grateful email to Bruce Wayne, acknowledging his help sincerely.
Immediately responds to a fire emergency by preparing to act as Wonder Woman.
Diana immediately responds to a news alert about a fire with decisive action, donning her Wonder Woman armor and leaping into action confidently.
Dwells on Steve's death and the stopped watch without showing hesitation or loss of focus, indicating emotional control while maintaining her mission focus.
